description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME.", maintenance of cleaning equipment and, " lifecycle old commercial cleaning equipment with new commercial cleaning equipment for CFB Borden buildings to maintain the Public Service cleaning team.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Standing Offer for Lifecycle Replacement of Commercial Cleaning Equipment

The Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Base Borden Rations and Quarters Support Services have issued a request for standing offer for the lifecycle replacement of commercial cleaning equipment. The equipment will be used for cleaning and maintenance of CFB Borden buildings.

### Tender Details

* **Title**: Cleaning Equipment
* **Reference Number**: WS4341515813
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4341515813
* **Publication Date**: December 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 18, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 22, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: January 21, 2025

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region), Canada

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Pan, Long (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [long.pan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:long.pan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: Not provided
	+ Fax: Not provided

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18320352?extsite=MTgzMjAzNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence requires lifecycle replacement of commercial cleaning equipment for CFB Borden buildings maintained by the Public Service cleaning team. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on the tender closing date.

Please note that this tender has expired as per the contracting entity's records.

#### converted UNSPSC Codes:

*  39121700 - Electrical hardware and supplies
*  This information may help procurement officers making decisions for the contract, as well as other interested parties.  The announcement was originally submitted with multiple lines but these lines were removed for formatting purposes.  
This rewritten entry rephrases the contractor's information in a clean and readable format
